table_columns.description: Names of the special table columns

session_token.description: Session token to verify when found by session_id

user_id.description: User ID (foreign key to user table)

user_login_filters.description: IListing filters to find user who is trying to log in. Listing should return none or one item (only the first is used if more is found).

user_login_property.description: Filter containing user's login (added to user_login_filters).

user_password_property.description: Property of the user state machine containing password hash (verified by PHP's function password_verify).
